topic.name: Summary
topic.content:
Although this Sector escaped the worst of the fallout during the cataclysm that befell the settled hemisphere, some residual radiation has lingered in what is now a lush wilderness speckled by occasional ruins. Whether by chance or design, a number of endemic floral species appear to showcase unique medicinal properties.
Obtain and analyse samples of 3 floral species. Harvest 50 units of Spyce. Our scouts report the presence of territorial predators- be prepared to give these a wide berth.
